<h3 id="X568">X(568)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOHARMONIC OF X(50)</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; sin A + cos A cot D/2, where where cot D/2 = (6R<sup>2</sup> - a<sup>2</sup> - b<sup>2</sup> - c<sup>2</sup>)/(4*area) and R = abc/(4*area)
<br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; a[3*R<sup>2</sup>(b<sup>2</sup> + c<sup>2</sup> - a<sup>2</sup>) + a<sup>2</sup>b<sup>2</sup> + a<sup>2</sup>c<sup>2</sup> - b<sup>4</sup> - c<sup>4</sup>], where R = abc/(4*area)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (Wimalasiri Perera, August 29, 2011)
<br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; cos A - 2 cos 2A cos(B - C) : :
<br>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2 (a^6 (b^2 + c^2) - a^4 (3 b^4 + b^2 c^2 + 3 c^4) + a^2 (3 b^6 - 2 b^4 c^2 - 2 b^2 c^4 + 3 c^6) - (b^2 - c^2)^2 (b^4 + c^4)) : :
<b><br>
3 X[2] - 4 X[13363], 3 X[5946] - 2 X[13363], 3 X[5946] - X[15067], 4 X[5946] - X[23039], 8 X[13363] - 3 X[23039], 4 X[15067] - 3 X[23039], X[3] + 2 X[52], X[3] - 4 X[389], 2 X[3] + X[6243], 5 X[3] - 8 X[9729], 5 X[3] - 2 X[10625], 11 X[3] - 8 X[13348], 7 X[3] - 16 X[15012], 7 X[3] - 4 X[15644], X[3] + 8 X[16625], 3 X[3] - 4 X[16836], 13 X[3] - 16 X[17704], 2 X[3] - 5 X[37481], 4 X[3] - X[37484], 2 X[3] - 3 X[40280], 4 X[6] - X[18438], X[52] + 2 X[389], 4 X[52] - X[6243], 5 X[52] + 4 X[9729], 5 X[52] + X[10625], 4 X[52] + X[13340], 11 X[52] + 4 X[13348], 7 X[52] + 8 X[15012], 7 X[52] + 2 X[15644], X[52] - 4 X[16625], 3 X[52] + 2 X[16836], 13 X[52] + 8 X[17704], 4 X[52] + 5 X[37481], 8 X[52] + X[37484], 4 X[52] + 3 X[40280], 8 X[389] + X[6243], 5 X[389] - 2 X[9729], 10 X[389] - X[10625], 8 X[389] - X[13340], 11 X[389] - 2 X[13348], 7 X[389] - 4 X[15012], 7 X[389] - X[15644], X[389] + 2 X[16625], 3 X[389] - X[16836], 13 X[389] - 4 X[17704], 8 X[389] - 5 X[37481], 16 X[389] - X[37484], 8 X[389] - 3 X[40280], 2 X[576] + X[37473], X[1351] + 2 X[19161], 2 X[3313] - 5 X[12017], 4 X[5097] - X[44439], 5 X[6243] + 16 X[9729], X[6243] + 4 X[9730], 5 X[6243] + 4 X[10625], 11 X[6243] + 16 X[13348], 7 X[6243] + 32 X[15012], 7 X[6243] + 8 X[15644], X[6243] - 16 X[16625], 3 X[6243] + 8 X[16836], 13 X[6243] + 32 X[17704], and many more
</b>
<p>
Let (A) be the circle centered at A that cuts off a segment of line BC equal to the radius of  (A).  Define (B) and (C) cyclically. Then X(568) is the radical center of circles (A), (B), (C). (Randy Hutson, December 2, 2017)
</p>
<p>
X(568) lies on the cubics K885 and K1139 and these lines: {2, 1154}, {3, 6}, {4, 94}, {5, 3567}, {20, 10263}, {23, 15032}, {24, 49}, {25, 10540}, {26, 6800}, {30, 3060}, {51, 381}, {54, 1658}, {68, <p>
X(568) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {51, 14831}, {52, 9730}, {1986, 45237}, {3060, 5890}, {5889, 11459}, {6243, 13340}, {6403, 15531}, {7576, 45968}<br>
X(568) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 5946}, {3, 9730}, {265, 45237}, {381, 51}, {1352, 16776}, {2979, 549}, {3845, 13451}, {3917, 5892}, {5054, 16226}, {5562, 10170}, {5655, 12824}, {5891, 5943}, {9730, 389}, {10170, 5462}, {11455, 15687}, {11459, 5}, {12162, 46847}, {13340, 3}, {14643, 16222}, {15060, 13364}, {15061, 46430}, {15067, 13363}, {15072, 45956}, {15305, 3845}, {15531, 1353}, {15681, 14855}, {16776, 32191}, {18435, 381}, {18436, 11459}, {23039, 2}, {32063, 41580}, {32609, 16223}, {37484, 13340}, {41330, 15544}, {44214, 16227}, {45237, 12236}, {46847, 10110}<br>
X(568) = anticomplement of X(15067)<br>
X(568) = Brocard-circle-inverse of X(567)<br>
X(568) = crosssum of X(3) and X(14852)<br>
X(568) = Cundy-Parry Phi transform of X(50)<br>
X(568) = Cundy-Parry Psi transform of X(94)<br>
X(568) = homothetic center of Ehrmann side-triangle and 2nd anti-Conway triangle
X(568) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {3, 6, 567}, {3, 52, 6243}, {3, 389, 37481}, {3, 567, 14805}, {3, 6243, 37484}, {3, 9730, 40280}, {3, 11432, 36753}, {3, 14627, 578},
